title: How did I get S-?
body: I got 40/8/7 with zed @30 minutes while my ally's kda was less than 20. The opposing zed was at 32 kills. I thought I would get s+ so how did I not get it?

replies.body:
It isn't a set score you need to achieve, it's all relative to how everyone else on the server is doing with the same champ in the same role.

From Riot:

> It’s based on the champion and role that you just played in a game. So, for example, we look at Annie mid differently to Annie support. We take a series of performance metrics and compare how you do to all other players in your region in your champion / position combination. It is percentile driven - so earning a high score means** you performed in the top x% of players** on that champ in that position. The grade itself governs the point gains.

[(Source)](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/champion-mastery)

[Basically grades similarly to a bell curve](http://study.com/academy/lesson/bell-curve-definition-impact-on-grades.html), meaning we have a server full of really good players. 

Riot hasn't released a list of the factors that contribute to a high grade, but I would suggest working on CS, objective assists, and possibly warding to bump up your grade that extra notch ♥

I know its based off of everyone else does in the server but I personally think

a KDA with Nautilus of 6/0/19 is worth more then an A+.

Because you're a Zed, if you went 100/0/0 then you miiiight get an S+ the system realises BS when it sees it.
So it wont reward you for getting lots of kills with a BS champ because thats expected.
I love your hate for zed hahaa
Remember you are being measured against other Zed mids. So from what I can see your KDA is too low (needs to be around 8+) and farm is definitely too low (30 mins? need 300, not 184).
I had 40 kills? and we were losing so instead of farming I went to help other lanes lel

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=jmpX5qoh,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-24T05:20:57.859+0000)
>
> I had 40 kills? and we were losing so instead of farming I went to help other lanes lel

Doing both is likely the criteria for the S+. Especially if you are a fed Zed, its time to split push and put your bot lane mid.
Oh ok, was just wondering c:

its still a less than 8 kda. of course, id much rather my zed be 40/8/7 than 7/1/1. the formula for KDA and just the way kills, deaths and assists are kind of "treated" by riot and the system is just impossibly difficult to measure in terms of a semblance for a technique to measure the impact someones made on a game. we cant even find out how much CC we've applied to our enemies in the post game lobby of a game

well it depends on what you did for the team it judges partly off

Kills-Deaths-Assists Ratio Minon Kills ratio, gold participation, how often you helped other lanes  and finally how many words you placed/destroyed :)
My team was pretty much losing and I was the one who kept them in the game by killing all the fed enemies. Owell.
atleast you got an S *cough* 22/1/17 vayne who placed 58 wards had 472 farm and participated in more than half my teams gold and got an A+ *cough*
